subject: Re: [Read_Alphabet] QS-SAMPA: a proposed format for plain-text Quickscript
msgSnippet: ... Well, it takes some getting used to.  Basically, T is to D as t is to d, which is a nice symmetry. -- By Elbereth and Luthien the Fair, you shall
messageBody:
Ted Larson Freeman scripsit:
> Oops! Showing I can't even follow the proposal on my first attempt...

Well, it takes some getting used to. Basically, T is to D as t is to d,
which is a nice symmetry.

--
By Elbereth and Luthien the Fair, you shall cowan@...
have neither the Ring nor me! --Frodo http://www.ccil.org/~cowan
